gui

Class GameGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GameGUI

  • public class GameGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game window
    Author:
    The WindowBuilder, Frederik Kammel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean gameFinished
      Deprecated. 
      GameJTable gameTable
      the GameJTable of the GUI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameGUI()
      Create the GameGUI window.
      GameGUI(WelcomeGUI caller)
      Creates the GameGUI window and reopens the WelcomeGUI after the game ends if caller object is not null.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void lockUI()
      Locks the GUI for user input.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Launch the GameGUI window.
      void playerPlayed(int row, int column)
      Sets the symbol and color for the player who just played in the JTable of the GameGUI.
      void quitGame()
      Quits the current game and returns to the calling window (normally the WelcomeGUI) if applicable
      void unlockUI()
      Unlocks the GUI again so that the user can do input.

    • Field Detail

      • gameTable

        public GameJTable gameTable
        the GameJTable of the GUI

      • gameFinished

        @Deprecated
public boolean gameFinished
        Deprecated. 

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameGUI

        public GameGUI()
        Create the GameGUI window. Same as GameGUI(null)

      • GameGUI

        public GameGUI(WelcomeGUI caller)
        Creates the GameGUI window and reopens the WelcomeGUI after the game ends if caller object is not null.
        Parameters:
        caller - The handle of the calling WelcomeGUI window

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Launch the GameGUI window. ATTENTION: It is highly recommended to launch the WelcomeGUI or the Main-class since launching GameGUI directly will bypass the Main Menu
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments

      • quitGame

        public void quitGame()
        Quits the current game and returns to the calling window (normally the WelcomeGUI) if applicable

      • playerPlayed

        public void playerPlayed(int row,
                         int column)
        Sets the symbol and color for the player who just played in the JTable of the GameGUI. Also checks if a player won the game and shows the win-message and quits the game then.
        Parameters:
        row - Row where the player played
        column - Column where the player played.

      • lockUI

        public void lockUI()
        Locks the GUI for user input. Useful while AI calculates its turn.

      • unlockUI

        public void unlockUI()
        Unlocks the GUI again so that the user can do input.
